game.name: Moto X3M 4 Winter
game.description:
Hit the icy roads and be prepared to challenge your intense motorcycling abilities through multiple unique and challenging levels in Moto X3M 4: Winter! There is no fun if you drive bikes at high speed on ordinary roads. We have brought to you a brand new racing game where you will be allowed to drive your two-wheeler through tricky tracks full of explosives, ramps, deadly traps and other challenging obstacles. Your objective is to help the motorcyclist to get to the finish line alive.

Put on your helmet and get ready to face off the hindrances of the thrilling tracks in this HTML5 car game! Make sure that your motorcyclist reaches the finish point without being injured. You are one who has decided to entertain the entire residents of the town to boost their winter celebration. It is not going to be easy to perform the stunts on the decorated streets and snowy roofs. Being a nice driver you know how to impress all by doing mind-blowing and thrilling stunts.

Try to complete each level as fast as you can to grab 3 stars rating in the end of this cool driving game! Your nice performance would also help you to unlock new riders like Santa, the reindeer or the Rudolf. Performing front or backflips will secure you to get some extra seconds and win the tag of being a professional X3M rider in this awesome bike stunt game! Good luck to finish all 15+ levels and have fun in this special winter racing adventure without download! Beautiful winter tracks, new challenges, unlockable new bikes and nice music will keep you entertained for hours.
